Html:
With the previous version as well as with the latest, WabbitEMU doesn't save its configuration anymore. As a result at each start it asks me to select a ROM image.
I've removed the folder "ApData\Roaming|WabbitEmu" as well as registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Wabbitemu, but this didn't help.

My PC is W10 Home 64-bit and I'm using the latest 64-bit version of WabbitEMU.

What can I do to fix this?

Ah, I may have found something.
I once again removed the folder "ApData\Roaming|WabbitEmu" as well as registry key HKEY_USERS\S-1-XXXXX\SOFTWARE\Wabbitemu (instead of HKEY_CURRENT_USER...).
And I've replaced the 64-bit wabbitEMU with the 32-bit version.

After initial selection of the ROM image, wabbitEMU restarts normally without any further questions.
So, is it the 64-bit version or is it that other registry key, or is it both?
